cuisine.tip.spawn1: You do not have Patchouli installed, so you cannot see the entire content in manual.
Allow chopping board to chop woods (for pack devs)
cuisine.gui.welcome:
Thanks for playing Cuisine!

To start, garther all kinds of raw food materials, and build yourself some basic processing devices.

Install Patchouli mod to unlock detailed information in this manual. We recommened to install JEI for recipes lookup.

Join our Discord to catch up latest news!
